timeline.message: Extracts tab, panes, tables styles to a module
Unwraps view and plugin tables from .pane-frame

Update table styles

- Styles are applied to the .bigtable class. There are some changes to .pane-frame
- Some styles are inherited from .pane-frame

Fix widget styles conflicting with tables

- Differentiates the side-panel widget pane borders from .pane-frame elements
- Fix padding spaces on project view header. The Functions#nbspIndent function was changed to return 2 less spaces
- Restored missing border on filtered plugins management table
- Fixed the alignment of some tables

Restyles the tab baseline and new item button

- The tabBar.jelly now has a prop to show a baseline. The default display of the baseline can also be themed

timeline.bodyText: do I even want to know?
timeline.author: timja

replies.bodyText:
You were too fast, I was about to comment on this hack to ask for advice. This function is use to pad the icon column names so that the letter is positioned above the icon. It's a weird one that I did not know how to fix:
Old:

New:

I want to at least put a comment before removing the draft status.
replies.author: fqueiruga

timeline.message: Set a min-width for the tabs

Address review comments

- Have two options for header color in sortable table headers (bigtables or not)
- Remove bigtable header font size variable as it was not changing anything
- Remove outdated comment

Revert "Unwraps view and plugin tables from .pane-frame" to solve merge conflicts

This reverts commit cfd90c48332a5205471dbe7b53eb37f42772c3fd.
